node.text:
Spotless beach, Endless shoreline! A destination that is as beautiful as your love for each other. Begin your forever journey amidst a backdrop of romantic perfection. The Raviz Kovalam was named one of the 11 stunning wedding destinations of South India by the Condé Nast Traveller! 
For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
